name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Game of Life Tab Saver

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Each new tab will provide the time as well as a simulation of the Game of Life, a famous cellular automaton, in the background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This minimalistic tab saver features both light and dark mode as well as a visibility button that will make the buttons appear or disappear. This button is located in the bottom right corner of the page.
